item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, June 22, 2024 at 1:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. US banking heir gave Trump campaign fund $50mn after ex-president’s conviction
2. [Opinion] Brace for the most distorted election result in British history
3. Octopus to repay £3bn of Bulb nationalisation costs
4. Keir Starmer: ‘People need hope, but it needs to be realistic hope’
5. Hinduja family members sentenced to jail for exploiting domestic staff
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, June 22, 2024 at 1:00 AM UTC
